attributes.comment: It is imperative to ensure that LGBTQIA+ needs are addressed in this proposed directory by asking providers to attest to LGBTQIA+ competency (if they have it), and having the directory searchable to the general public for providers by location + LGBTQIA+ competency. It is exceptionally hard for LGBTQIA+ individuals to find affirming healthcare, especially in certain areas of the country, leading to traumatization/victimization in healthcare settings, outright denial of care by providers/practices, and avoidance of needed care by LGBTQIA+ patients. Having these options built-in to the directory would help decrease LGBTQIA+ health disparities, improving access to needed safe and affirming healthcare.

attributes.title: Comment on CMS-2022-0163-0001
